Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.pages.subparts

Class SchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.pages.subparts.SchoolBoard
public class SchoolBoard extends Object
Class used for printing a single school board. It always returns to the starting point.
Author:
Matteo Negro

  • Method Details

    • print

      public static org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi print(Map<HouseColor,Integer> entrance, Map<HouseColor,Integer> diningRoom, Map<HouseColor,Boolean> professors, TowerType tower, int towersNumber, int assistant, int coins, String name, WizardType wizard, boolean active, boolean exp)
      Print the school board.
      Parameters:
      entrance - Map of students which are on the entrance.
      diningRoom - Map of students which are on the dining room.
      professors - Map of professors are owned by the player.
      tower - Color of the towers belong to the player.
      towersNumber - Number of the towers.
      assistant - Id of the played assistant.
      coins - Number of coins.
      name - Name of the school board owner.
      wizard - Wizard type link to the player.
      active - Boolean second to set the active player.
      exp - Boolean second to set whether the school board is for expert game mode.
      Returns:
      The Ansi stream to print to terminal.

    • parsePawn

      private static org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi parsePawn(int pawnsNumber, HouseColor houseColor, int precision, boolean active, WizardType wizard)
      Parses the number of students of a specific color in order to render them correctly.
      Parameters:
      pawnsNumber - Number of pawns.
      houseColor - Pawn color.
      precision - Number of digits.
      active - Boolean second to set the active player.
      wizard - Wizard type link to the player.
      Returns:
      The Ansi stream to print to terminal.

      Prints the number of students.
      Parameters:

      pawnsNumber - Number of pawns.
      Returns:
